title: Agilus Diagnostics- Blood Test
description: Agilus Diagnostics – Your Health our Priority We are India's largest diagnostics company by geographic reach and the only lab with a pan-India presence. With over 28 years of experience, we offer a comprehensive test menu of 3,600+ tests, including blood tests and full body health checkups. Our network includes 400+ labs, 3,900+ customer touchpoints and 12,000+ direct clients across 1,000+ cities in 30 states and union territories, with 43 NABL/CAP accredited labs. About The Agilus Diagnostics Mobile App With the aim of making healthcare accessible with ease, our app is your one stop destination to book full body health checkups and blood tests at home, track and manage reports and get assistance on your prescribed full body tests. Simplify your health journey by using these features on our app – • Book Home Collection • Find Your Nearest Lab • Upload Prescription and get assistance from Agilus Experts • Track and Manage reports for you and your family • Smart reports that offer a roadmap to your overall health • Get password protected reports on WhatsApp • In depth test details for all complete body checkup packages Most Common Routine Tests – • Sugar (Glucose) • Diabetes Test • Cholesterol • Lipid Profile • Thyroid • Hemoglobin Test • CBC • Liver Function Test • Kidney Function Test • Vitamin Level • Iron Level • Pregnancy Test • HIV Test • Urine Test • CRP Agilus Care Packages – Meticulously curated full Body Health Checkups that provide a detailed insight of your health. • Vital Care • Active Care • Active Pro • Premium Care • Diabetes & Heart Care • Student Care • Pre Marriage Care Get Timely Reports Agilus Diagnostics ensures rapid, accurate, and reliable diagnostic results through advanced technology and skilled professionals. Our quick turnaround times support prompt medical decisions and improved patient care, providing healthcare providers and patients with critical information when it matters most. Club Agilus – Loyalty Program Join Club Agilus, a unique health rewards program designed to promote better health and offer savings. With a holistic approach, Club Agilus supports your entire family's healthcare needs, blending care with Agilus’s expertise. Enjoy exclusive offers, services, and benefits, and earn Club Agilus Coins on the app. Start your journey to a healthier and more rewarding lifestyle today! Book your online blood test using your laptop or desktop, visit https://agilusdiagnostics.com/agiluscare/ and schedule your appointment to explore our various health checkup packages. For more information on diseases, full body checkups and blood tests, check out our informative blogs at https://agilusdiagnostics.com/blogs  Stay updated on our latest offers and tests by following us on: LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/agilusdiagnostics/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/agilusdiagnostics/ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/agilusdiagnostics YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@AgilusCare X - https://x.com/agilusDx
descriptionHTML:
Agilus Diagnostics – Your Health our Priority

We are India's largest diagnostics company by geographic reach and the only lab with a pan-India presence. With over 28 years of experience, we offer a comprehensive test menu of 3,600+ tests, including blood tests and full body health checkups.

Our network includes 400+ labs, 3,900+ customer touchpoints and 12,000+ direct clients across 1,000+ cities in 30 states and union territories, with 43 NABL/CAP accredited labs.


About The Agilus Diagnostics Mobile App

With the aim of making healthcare accessible with ease, our app is your one stop destination to book full body health checkups and blood tests at home, track and manage reports and get assistance on your prescribed full body tests.

Simplify your health journey by using these features on our app –

• Book Home Collection
• Find Your Nearest Lab
• Upload Prescription and get assistance from Agilus Experts
• Track and Manage reports for you and your family
• Smart reports that offer a roadmap to your overall health
• Get password protected reports on WhatsApp
• In depth test details for all complete body checkup packages

Most Common Routine Tests –
• Sugar (Glucose)
• Diabetes Test
• Cholesterol
• Lipid Profile
• Thyroid
• Hemoglobin Test
• CBC
• Liver Function Test
• Kidney Function Test
• Vitamin Level
• Iron Level
• Pregnancy Test
• HIV Test
• Urine Test
• CRP

Agilus Care Packages –

Meticulously curated full Body Health Checkups that provide a detailed insight of your health.
• Vital Care
• Active Care
• Active Pro
• Premium Care
• Diabetes & Heart Care
• Student Care
• Pre Marriage Care

Get Timely Reports

Agilus Diagnostics ensures rapid, accurate, and reliable diagnostic results through advanced technology and skilled professionals. Our quick turnaround times support prompt medical decisions and improved patient care, providing healthcare providers and patients with critical information when it matters most.

Club Agilus – Loyalty Program

Join Club Agilus, a unique health rewards program designed to promote better health and offer savings. With a holistic approach, Club Agilus supports your entire family's healthcare needs, blending care with Agilus’s expertise. Enjoy exclusive offers, services, and benefits, and earn Club Agilus Coins on the app. Start your journey to a healthier and more rewarding lifestyle today!

Book your online blood test using your laptop or desktop, visit https://agilusdiagnostics.com/agiluscare/ and schedule your appointment to explore our various health checkup packages.

For more information on diseases, full body checkups and blood tests, check out our informative blogs at https://agilusdiagnostics.com/blogs 


Stay updated on our latest offers and tests by following us on:

LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/agilusdiagnostics/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/agilusdiagnostics/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/agilusdiagnostics
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@AgilusCare
X - https://x.com/agilusDx
summary: Book blood tests & full body health checkups at home with our pathology lab
